rules.description: Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Change right_command key to command+control+option+shift. (Post f19 key when pressed alone)
MouseButton 3 to command + option + control + shift. (Post f19 key when pressed alone)
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0 & https://spacelauncherapp.com)
SpaceFN: Space+[ijkl] to Up, Left, Down, Right
SpaceFN: Space+[sfed] to Home, End, Page Up, Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space+p to Print Screen, Space+Open Bracket ([) to Scroll Lock, Space+Close Bracket (]) to Pause, Space+Backslash (\) to Insert
SpaceFN: Space+e to Escape, Space+m to Backtick (`), Space+Comma to Tilde (~)
SpaceFN: Disable SpaceFN mode after last typing
